title: "High-tech pavement markers support autonomous driving in tough conditions, remote areas"
excerpt: "Self-driving electric vehicles still face steep hills on the road to reliability. Researchers from the Department of Energy's Oak Ridge National Laboratory and Western Michigan University are working together to drive solutions from outside the car: sensors and processing embedded in road infrastructure."
